comment: Great professor! Took her for a summer course and has few assignments! Easy grader and works on one essay all semester which you can write on a topic you choose. Would definitely take again!

I took it online during summer. She post weekly modules, as long as you do those and checks off each item in the module, you will get an easy A. She also post example essays that you can mirror. She is also lenient when it comes to grading. Its one of those freebie classes where everyone gets an A as long as you follow instructions.

I took her ENGL 1101 class and loved it so much I took her again. She is an amazing professor and a very sweet lady. She gives excellent feedback, grades in a timely manner, and is willing to help if you need it. Dr. Klein helped my writing improve tremendously, and I wish I could take her again. TAKE HER CLASS!!!

Dr. Klein was AMAZING! Her assignments allow for creativity, and she's always just an email away if you have a question. One of the most valuable parts of this course was her feedback: she provides detailed examples of how to improve your work and helps you enhance your strengths. Dr. Klein truly wants her students to succeed.

Dr. Klein is the best. She lays out the steps you need in order to complete essays. No quizzes or tests and is accessible outside of the class. She is very understanding if you need an extension. 10/10 I have her for my next semester.

A great professor who gives great feedback I took her for the fall semester of '21 and I did really well. You have 3 major assignments/ papers a final reflection and then peer reviews and online responses every other week. You learn many writing skills that can help you in English as well as other classes As long as you do the work you should be ok

I took this class online and it was a pretty easy A. She gives plenty of time for you to complete the work and may offer extensions if you ask. Overall, she is super caring and willing to help. I enjoyed her class a lot.
Wonderful and caring teacher! Would take her for every English class if I could

I took this class online and actually enjoyed it. The professor lets you pick your topic that you will be working with all semester. As long as you follow the rubric and turn everything in on time you will 100% get an A. The class is steps that lead up to a final essay and everything is broken down to make the essay super easy to write.

Dr. Klein has so far been my favorite professor I've has at KSU. I had to go through some personal issues this past semester and she was so accommodating and understanding with me throughout the whole process. Her class is incredibly straight forward and she provides a great path for success. Incredible experience overall.

Dr. Klein is such a SWEETHEART! I absolutely adore her, as you can tell that she genuinely cares about each and every one of her students. Her course is wonderfully paced, and there was not a single time that I felt she required too much of us at once. You will have to work for a good grade, but her grading procedures are incredibly fair.

I LOVE Dr. Klein. You can tell she really cares about her students and will do her best to help you in any way possible. She gives great feedback and not a ridiculous amount of assignments. I would definitely recommend taking her, she's the best!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: Dr. Klein is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is so willing to help you in any way she can, and can break anything down to something very simple to understand. She is a great teacher and for someone who isn't a huge English/Lit fan, I love this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Klein was very knowledgable and does care about her student's success. However, she was a very tough grader. I felt like some things just were not good enough for her even though I tried my hardest. There are weekly readings so the book is definitely required and she talks about it in class so make sure to always read those.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Overall, she's a great professor. There are three major assignments, weekly discussions and readings, and you have to submit multiple drafts. She is very willing to work with you if you talk to her. If you don't understand something, she helps you! I did become a much better writer because of this class. She gives incredible feedback as well.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Klein is such a great professor. As someone who isn't a fan of english, she made it very simple and straight forward. She breaks down assignments into checkpoints for a big paper, grading each checkpoint and giving feedback. Make sure you use her office hours, she is so easy to talk to and will help you with anything you ask about a paper.
